Source: https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/hungergames.30102/

Description:
HungerGames is a newly developed plugin who strives to be not only the best, but also the most efficient hungergames plugin. It provides advanced kits, spawns, and a very simple arena setup. If you’ve never heard of the book/movie hungergames, it’s basically a free for all. You must hunt for food and items, and attempt to kill others before they kill you. The last man standing wins!
​

Features:

  • Auto updating lobbies
  • Custom min-players & max-players & timers per arena
  • Very lightweight
  • Multiple arena support
  • Multiverse support
  • YAW + Pitch spawn support
  • Vault economy support
  • Simple arena setup
  • Random items
  • Smart mob spawning engine
  • Highly configurable
  • Per-arena settings
  • Moderatable games
  • Economy support
  • Scoreboard support
  • Kits
  • Factions support
  • McMMO support
  • World-guard support
  • Full Rollback System

  1. First, exicute “/hg wand”. This will toggle our region selection wand!
  2. Now select 2 points, like so http://i.imgur.com/F0jdnRv.png
  3. Once u have 2 points, create an arena “/hg create <name> <min-player-limit> <max-player-limit> <time-limit-in-seconds>”
  4. Add random spawns “/hg addspawn” (Must have same, or more then max-limit-players!)
  5. Set the lobby wall “/hg setlobbywall” (While pointing at first sign!)
  6. Run the debugger! “/hg debug <arena>”
  7. Enable the cool options within hungergames/config yml
  8. Enjoy!

https://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/thehungergames/pages/configuration/
